t:
I'm cursed and will die in a week unless I tell this story to someone else, in which case the curse will move on to them.
Only way to stop the curse is if I tell it to someone who won't tell to anyone else.



I take a deep breath and get ready for my baby's new bedtime story.
c:
A small price to pay for greater goods.



#curse #escape #story #son #selfish #kill #nolove #sacrifice
